document_data.name: ''Siegebreaker''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Siegebreakers''''' were powerful [[enchanted]] [[heavy crossbow]]s from [[Hillsfar]] in the [[Moonsea]] region.
document_data.Powers: ''Siegebreakers'' were not just more powerful than regular crossbows, they were also truly massive in size. These weapons generated enough damage to break through a brick wall and pulverize flesh and bone. ''Siegebreakers'' were empowered with ''4'' enchantments and dealt additional bludgeoning damage to their targets as well as dealing even more devastating damage with a lucky well-aimed shot.
document_data.History: ''Siegebreakers'' weapons were available in the city of Hillsfar in the late 14{{th}} century [[DR]].
